Miscellaneous¶

This section describes core functionality within HWIOS that doesn’t fit in any category specifically (yet).

Settings¶

Simple settings controller to manage some HWIOS settings that are managed from the database.

services.web_ui.controllers.ws.settings¶

The websocket logics for HWIOS settings

copyright:Copyright 2011-2012 OS-Networks
license:LGPL, See LICENSE for details.

Bases: object

Websocket controller class for HWIOS settings

Renders the settings template for this client

Parameters:client (Client) – The requesting client
Returns:dict - Html-layout data response
save_settings(client, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Handles saving of the settings and gettings the settings view again

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • params (dict) – The form-parameters from the settings view
Returns:

dict - Status and html-layout data response
